name: Keep On Dreaming
description:
WebGL playable (fullscreen recommended), a .zip file is recommended for a better playing experience. :)

Controls:

LMB (hold and drag): to Move

R: to Restart

Esc: to Pause

Save Brian from his nightmares and guide him towards better dreams in this short puzzle strategy game. Made in 4 days for the Wowie Game Jam 2022.

Made By:

Berend Driessens

Guus Knol

Sound Effects by:

Syncontour
